dataList.desc:
Turn Start: At 40+ SP, consume 20 SP to enter the Volatile E.G.O::Waxen Pinion state. (this 'Turn Start' effect does not activate repeatedly)

If 2+ allies are defeated in a single turn, and if this unit's SP isn't at -45 at Turn End, reset SP to 20; then, enter the Volatile E.G.O::Waxen Pinion state. (if both conditions are met at the same time, whichever condition that results in a higher SP goes into effect)

If this unit gets Staggered due to damage or raised Stagger Threshold when entering the Volatile E.G.O state, recover from Stagger. If the Stagger is something that cannot be naturally recovered from, this unit does not enter the Volatile E.G.O state.

Gain [UnstableFeeling] while in the Volatile E.G.O state.

Turn Start: At 0 or less SP, exit the Volatile E.G.O::Waxen Pinion state.

dataList.name: Flaring Brand
dataList.desc: When the #1 Sinner to be Deployed Heads Hits, inflict +1 [Combustion] Count (4 times per turn)
dataList.summary: On Heads Hit, inflict +1 [Combustion] Count

dataList.name: Assignment Evaluation
dataList.desc:
On Hit, if the target has 6+ [Laceration], heal 2 SP.
Heal 1 additional SP for every type of negative effect on the target. (max 3)
If this unit's SP is at max, gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn when this unit heals SP with this effect.
(This Passive activates 4 times max per turn)
dataList.summary: Conditional SP Heal On Hit. At max SP, gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn

dataList.name: Assignment Evaluation
dataList.desc:
On Hit, if the target has <style="highlight">4</style>+ [Laceration], heal 2 SP.
Heal 1 additional SP for every type of negative effect on the target. (max 3)
If this unit's SP is at max, gain <style="highlight">2</style> [AttackUp] next turn when this unit heals SP with this effect.
(This Passive activates 4 times max per turn)
dataList.summary: Conditional SP Heal On Hit. At max SP, gain 2 [AttackUp] next turn

dataList.name: Practices on Aesthetics
dataList.desc:
1 ally with the least SP heals 2 SP On Hit for every type of negative effect on the target. (max 6)
(This Passive activates 2 times max per turn)
dataList.summary: On Hit, heal SP based on the number of negative effect types on the target

dataList.name: Practices on Aesthetics
dataList.desc:
1 ally with the least SP heals 2 SP On Hit for every type of negative effect on the target. (max 6)
<style="highlight">If the target has [Laceration], heal 3 additional SP.</style>
(This Passive activates 2 times max per turn)
dataList.summary: On Hit, heal SP based on the number of negative effect types on the target

dataList.name: Multitude of Dots
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: Inflict 2 Potency for 1 of the following effects on 1 enemy with the least types of negative effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Effect selected at random.
(In Focused Encounters, a Part)
dataList.summary: Combat Start: Inflict 2 Potency for a random status effect to an enemy

dataList.name: Multitude of Dots
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: Inflict 2 Potency for 1 of the following effects on <style="highlight">2</style> enemies with the least types of negative effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Effect selected at random.
(In Focused Encounters, Parts)
dataList.summary: Combat Start: Inflict 2 Potency for a random status effect to 2 enemies

dataList.name: Rough Sketch
dataList.desc:
1 ally with the least SP heals 4 SP when defeating an enemy with [Laceration].
Heal 1 additional SP for every type of negative effect on the target. (max 4. Once per turn)
dataList.summary: Heal SP on self On Kill against targets with [Laceration]

dataList.name: Rough Sketch
dataList.desc:
1 ally with the least SP heals 4 SP when defeating an enemy with [Laceration].
Heal 1 additional SP for every type of negative effect on the target. (max 4. 3 times per turn)
dataList.summary: Heal SP on self On Kill against targets with [Laceration]

dataList.name: Sanguine Pointillist
dataList.desc: This Identity only counts as an 'Identity that inflicts [Laceration]'. This Identity's Skills that randomly inflict [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking] do not count as Skills that inflict each respective Keyword.

dataList.name: Sanguine Pointillist
dataList.desc: This Identity only counts as an 'Identity that inflicts [Laceration]'. This Identity's Skills that randomly inflict [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking] do not count as Skills that inflict each respective Keyword.

dataList.name: N.O.
dataList.desc:
- When an other ally Staggers an enemy with an attack: follow up with a Skill 1 against the Staggered enemy. (once per Turn)
- If multiple enemies are Staggered at once, target the enemy with the least HP(for Abnormalities, target the Abnormality with the least HP; then, target the Part with the least HP).
- When using Skill 1 with this effect, this unit gains +1 more [Vibration] Count from its Coin effects, and triggers a [VibrationExplosion] with the last Coin On Hit

dataList.name: The A.I.
dataList.desc: #1 Deployed ally gains +1 more Tremor Count from their Skill or Coin effects (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Vibroweld Morph-combat Cane (Unauthorized Invention)
dataList.desc: Turn End: gain [AttackDmgUp] next turn equal to the number of times this unit triggered [VibrationExplosion] this turn (max 3)

dataList.name: In the Culprit's Shoes
dataList.desc: When #1 Deployed Identity triggers Estallido de Tremor with Skill or Coin effects, 25% chance to trigger an additional Estallido de Tremor (once per turn)

dataList.name: Golden Time - Extracting
dataList.desc:
Turn End: If this unit's HP is between 10% ~ 20%, instantly heal 80% of this unit's max HP, and recover from Stagger. (once per Encounter)

When this unit loses [TimeRentalTwoPersonality], gain +8 [Aggro] to one of this unit's Skill Slots next turn

dataList.name: T Corp. Physics Distortion Field
dataList.desc: When 1 ally with the slowest Speed takes damage from enemies with [Vibration], take -10% less damage

dataList.name: Golden Time - Standoff
dataList.desc:
Turn End: if this unit's HP is between 16% ~ 20%, instantly heal up to 60% of Max HP, and recover from Stagger. (once per Encounter)

When Clashing against targets with [TimeSuspend], Clash Power +2
Take -10% less damage from targets with [TimeSuspend]

dataList.name: T Corp. Martial Arts
dataList.desc: To 1 ally with the fastest Speed: Clash Power +1 when Clashing against targets with 5+ [Vibration]
